meanings.sent1: The televiewer enjoyed watching their favorite show every evening.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a dedicated televiewer and never misses an episode of that series.
meanings.sent3: The televiewer couldn't stop laughing at the funny commercials during the show.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were glued to the screen, like a televiewer mesmerized by a captivating program.
meanings.sent5: The televiewer's living room was filled with the sound of laughter and music from the TV.

meanings.definition: A device used for viewing television broadcasts.
meanings.sent1: The televiewer was placed in the center of the living room for optimal viewing.
meanings.sent2: I adjusted the settings on the televiewer to get a clearer picture of the game.
meanings.sent3: The televiewer seemed to have a mind of its own, changing channels randomly.
meanings.sent4: The televiewer's screen lit up the room like a window to another world.
meanings.sent5: With a click of a button, the televiewer brought the latest news right into our home.
